snippet: Prismatic, a new social news discovery site, helps people find news topics on Twitter that they might normally not be able to find. An artificial intelligence program combs through the content being shared on social media.
abstract: Prismatic, a new social news discovery site, helps people find news topics on Twitter that they might normally not be able to find. An artificial intelligence program combs through the content being shared on social media.

headline.main: Prismatic Hopes to Create a New Category of Social News
